content: Please provide more information, and we will attempt to assist.
creator: davidsk

content: It may not be possible, as Thunderbird does not have a backup unless the user does that. If messages were put in Trash and then the Trash deleted, then they are lost.
creator: davidsk

content:
If you are using release 136, you can select setting>appearance and easily fix it. If you are using release 128, it is a few steps, but not many. Here is more information: 

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/message-threading-thunderbird
creator: davidsk
